mapper.select: SELECT a.mid,b.rid,a.mname,b.rname FROM ma_match a LEFT JOIN ma_race b ON b.mid = a.mid WHERE a.delflg='00' AND b.delflg='00' AND a.mstatus !='01' ORDER BY b.rcode, a.createdate DESC ,b.createdate
